clinical_study.brief_title: Revavtio Special Investigation for Long-term Use in Pediatric Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Revatio Special Investigation - Investigation For Long-term Use Of Revatio In Pediatric Patients -

brief_summary.textblock: Secondary data collection study: safety and effectiveness of Revatio in pediatric patients under Japanese medical practice

detailed_description.textblock: The objective of this study is to obtain the information on dosage and administration, safety, and efficacy of Revatio when it is administered for a long period of time (1 year) under the actual use after the approval of the dosage and administration in pediatric patients (aged 1 year or older, weighed 8 kg or more) .

primary_outcome.measure: Effictiveness rate for physician's evaluation of this product

secondary_outcome.measure: the dosage and administration under the actual use (including patients under the age of 1 year, weighing below 8 kg)

intervention.description: [REVATIO® Tablets / REVATIO® OD Film] Adults Usually, sildenafil 20 mg is orally given three times daily. Children aged 1 year or older In children weighing 20 kg or more: Usually, sildenafil 20 mg is orally given three times daily. [REVATIO® Dry Syrup for Suspension] Adults Usually, sildenafil 20 mg is orally given three times daily. Children aged 1 year or older In children weighing 8 kg or more but less than 20 kg: Usually, sildenafil 10 mg is orally given three times daily. In children weighing 20 kg or more: Usually, sildenafil 20 mg is orally given three times daily.

study_pop.textblock: Pediatric patients aged 0 to under 15 years who were confirmed to have received Revatio after the approval date of dosage and administration of Revatio for pediatric patients

criteria.textblock:
